# areWirelessRoutesAvailable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating wireless routes are available.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var areWirelessRoutesAvailable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], a wireless route is available for user selection. Some types of wireless routes are only discovered when the view is present in the window hierarchy.

## Deprecated

- **volumeWarningSliderImage**: The image used to designate the European Union volume limit.
- **showsRouteButton**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the route button is visible in the volume view.
- **isWirelessRouteActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the wireless route is active.
- **routeButtonImage(for:)**: Returns the button image associated with the specified control state.
- **routeButtonRect(forBounds:)**: Returns the drawing rectangle for the route button.
- **setRouteButtonImage(_:for:)**: Assigns a button image to the specified control states.
